title: Peru’s President Dissolves Congress, Accusing Lawmakers of Blocking Reforms
text:
LIMA, Peru—Peru’s President Martín Vizcarra announced on Monday that he was dissolving Congress, prompting lawmakers to suspend his powers and swear in the country’s vice president as the new president, and setting up a constitutional crisis and possible political unrest in one of Washington’s closest Latin American allies.

In a televised address, Mr. Vizcarra accused the opposition-led Congress of obstructing the government’s anticorruption reforms and trying to stack the country’s top court. Mr. Vizcarra had proposed early...
description: Peru’s Congress suspends Mr. Vizcarra’s powers and swears in the country’s vice president as new president.
